Steps.Description: Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a) If opponent uses Night Slash, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
Step 2b) If opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2c) If opponent switches into Bronzong/Exeggutor, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol/Flareon, then switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2d) If opponent switches out into Empoleon, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: If opponent uses Fire Blast
Step 2a: Switch immediately into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 2b: If opponent does not swap out, x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
Step 2c: If opponent switches out into Empoleon while you set up, immediately switch to Poliwrath then switch to the second Metagross Trick
Step 2c.a: If opponent switches back into Altaria, switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
Step 2c.b: If opponent does not swap out, switch back to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2: If opponent uses Fire Flamethrower
Step 2a: Switch into Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2: If opponent switches out into Clefable
Step 2a: Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Lucario.
Step 2b: Switch into Chandelure x5 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2) Opponent switches into Exeggutor. Switch to Blissey and use Softboiled.
Step 2a If opponent switches into Absol, switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b If opponent switches into Flareon, switch into Chandelure then use Flamethrower to kill Empoleon. Switch into Blissey and use Softboiled
Step 2b.a If opponent switches into Absol, If it switches into Absol, switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b.b If opponent switches into Flareon, switch into Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Girafarig
Step 2: Use Stealth Rock
Step 3: Switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a) If Opponent uses Seismic Toss, immediately switch into Chandelure x5 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b) If Opponent uses Fire Blast, immediately switch into Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2c) If Opponent switches into Golurk, switch to Excadrill ×2 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2d) If Opponent switches into Umbreon, immediately switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Golurk. Switch into Chandelure x6 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Use Stealth Rock
Step 3: Switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: If player gets Life Orb, use Stealth Rock and immediately switch to Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a: If player gets get Choice Scarf, switch to Blissey and use Trick then immediately switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Lucario. Switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Lucario
Step 2: Switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Opponent does not switch out and uses Hydro Pump/Surf, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Bronzong/Exeggutor, switch to Blissey and use Trick
Step 2b.a: If Opponent switches into Absol, then switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b.b: If Opponent switches into Flareon, immediately switch to Chandelure and then use Flamethrower. Then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled
Step 2b.b.a: If Opponent switches to Absol,then switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b.b.b: If Opponent switches to Flareon, switch to Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2c: If Opponent switches out into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2d: If Opponent switches into Golurk, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2e: If Opponent switches into Umbreon, immediately switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Golurk/Lucario. Switch into Chandelure x6 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick then switch to Blissey. Use Softboiled
Step 2a: If Opponent switches to Absol, switch to Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled

Step 2b.b: If Opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure ×3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep.
Step 1a: If Opponent switches and Empoleon is sent out, use Flamethrower to kill. Switch back into Blissey  and use Softboiled

Step 1a.b: If Opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure ×3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2c: If Opponent switches into Clefable, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure ×5 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Mantine, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick as it switches into Umbreon. Switch immediately to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Lucario. Switch to Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2b: If player gets Expert Belt, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then ×2 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a: If Opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch to Blissey Trick as it switches back to Golurk. Switch back to Chandelure ×6 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 1: Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out to Golurk. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 1: Switch to Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep, use recovery items if necessary OR Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Switch to Blissey and use Trick
Step 2a: If Opponent switches out into Golurk, switch into Chandelure ×6 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches out into Lucario, switch into Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If player gets Assault Vest, switch to Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If player gets Choice Specs, switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2c: If player gets Leftovers, switch into Chandelure x5 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Crit Foul Play from Liepard doesn’t kill, no priority)
Step 2d: If Opponent switches into Altaria, switch into Chandelure ×3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2e: If Opponent switches to Bronzong, switch to Blissey as it switches out into Exeggutor and use Trick as it switches out into Flareon. Switch out into Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2f: If Opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2g: If Opponent switches into Claydol, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then ×2 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2g.a: If Opponent switches into Mantine while you set up, switch to Blissey Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Then switch into Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2h: If Opponent switches into Golurk and you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill ×2 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2i: If Opponent switches into Golurk and you get Expert Belt, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then ×2 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2j: If Opponent switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Lucario. Switch into Chandelure ×6 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick

Step 2a: If Opponent does not switch, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to remove Sharpedo Focus Sash. Switch to Blissey and use Trick to lock Waterfall. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Rhyperior/Tangrowth, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Trick then switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Opponent uses Heat Wave
Step 2a.a: If Player got Black Sludge, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a.b: If Player got Focus Sash, swap into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a.c: If Player got Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent uses Super Fang, use Stealth Rock and switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b.a: If If Ditto is sent out, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Flamethrower. Switch to Chandelure again and KO it with Shadow Ball then sweep
Step 2c: If Opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch into Excadrill ×3 Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a.a: If Opponent switches into Crobat, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure x2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If Opponent switches into Crobat, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure x2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2c: If Opponent uses any other moves and stays, use Stealth Rock as it switches out into Crobat. Immediately switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure x2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a.b.a: If Opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill. 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a.b.b: If Opponent switches into Samurott, use Thunder Punch to KO it. Rhyperior will be sent in, then immediately switch into Chandelure and switch into the Choice Band Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a.c: If Opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed then sweep
